title: E2E: sync lifecycle
description: Tests 4+5 from testing.md — tamper version marker, verify stale detection, sync, verify content preservation

title: Write agent-loop.sh end-to-end test
description: The agent-loop.sh script in scripts/ needs manual or integration testing. Verify: agent lease claim/release, has_work() function, clean exit on no work, cleanup trap. May need mock botbus/br for CI.

title: Run Level 2 eval: agent task execution with protocol compliance scoring
description:
Execute first Level 2 behavioral evaluation.

Steps:
1. Create eval environment in /tmp with botbox init
2. Seed with simple task (hello world endpoint)
3. Spawn agent with minimal prompt
4. Observe behavior, collect tool outputs
5. Score using rubric (critical steps: claim/start/finish/release/sync)
6. Document findings: protocol compliance, work quality, gaps
7. Update eval-proposal.md or create eval-results/ with findings

Goal: Validate that AGENTS.md enables protocol-compliant behavior in practice.

title: E2E: existing repo clone and init
description: Test 3 from testing.md — clone botcrit into /tmp, run botbox init, verify no clobbering

title: UX test: subagent reads AGENTS.md and answers workflow questions
description:
Spawn a subagent in a fresh botbox-initialized repo. Have them read AGENTS.md and answer questions about the workflow to validate doc clarity and completeness.

Steps:
1. Create fresh test repo with botbox init
2. Spawn subagent in that directory
3. Ask them to read AGENTS.md
4. Ask non-leading questions about: identity, triage, starting work, cross-project feedback, reviews, tools
5. Evaluate their understanding
6. Write report of findings
7. Create ux-test.md documenting this testing methodology

title: E2E: fresh repo non-interactive init
description: Test 1 from testing.md — create tmp repo, run botbox init with all CLI flags, verify outputs, doctor, sync --check

title: Warn when --init-beads is ignored due to tools list
description: init --init-beads is silently skipped when beads is not in the tools list. Should warn the user: 'Skipping beads init: beads not in tools list'.

title: Build the real botbox CLI (init, sync, doctor)
description: The CLI scaffold is built with commander, inquirer, bun. Commands are stubbed with real logic. Needs end-to-end validation: run botbox init in a temp project, verify files created, run botbox sync, run botbox doctor. Fix any issues found.
close_reason: CLI is complete. init/sync/doctor all implemented with 50 passing tests and 8 e2e tests. Dog-fooded during development.

title: Draft mesh protocol spec
description: Write initial mesh protocol draft with message schema, claims/leases, spawn lifecycle, and review loop.

title: Fix extra blank line in AGENTS.md when no reviewers
description: renderAgentsMd produces a double blank line before the comment when reviewers is empty, due to template string interpolation of empty reviewerSection. Normalize the whitespace.

title: Replace process.exit() in commands with thrown errors
description: Commands call process.exit() directly, which kills testability and prevents composition. Refactor: commands throw errors or return exit codes, entry point (index.mjs) catches and calls process.exit(). This also fixes doctor calling process.exit(0) on success and unblocks testing sync --check and sync with missing .agents/.

title: Draft botbox website
description: Create a minimal brutalist botbox landing page for agents, covering tools and workflow.

title: Fix sync printing null for missing version marker
description: When .version file is missing, readVersionMarker returns null. sync.mjs prints 'Synced: null → abc123'. Should print 'Synced: (none) → abc123' or similar.

title: Write tests for @botbox/cli
description: Write bun test suite covering: lib/docs.mjs (listWorkflowDocs, copyWorkflowDocs, currentVersion, version markers), lib/templates.mjs (renderAgentsMd, updateManagedSection with and without existing markers), commands/init.mjs (non-interactive mode, file creation, symlink), commands/sync.mjs (up-to-date check, stale detection, update), commands/doctor.mjs (tool checks, project structure checks). Use bun:test framework with temp directories.

title: E2E: interactive edge cases via botty
description: Test 7 from testing.md — arrow keys, deselect all, send-bytes for special keys

title: E2E: interactive init via botty
description: Test 2 from testing.md — spawn botbox init inside botty, drive prompts with send/wait/snapshot

title: Add files field to package.json
description: No files field in package.json. Add files: [src/, docs/] to ensure workflow docs ship in the npm tarball.

title: Add botbox-triage skill to handle incoming work requests
description: The triage skill (draft/triage.md) needs to handle cross-project work requests via botbus. Define the convention: how an agent in project X sends a task-request to project Y's channel, and how the triage loop picks it up and creates a bead.
close_reason: Obsolete. Pivoted away from skills to workflow docs. Triage is now documented in triage.md and report-issue.md handles cross-project feedback.

title: Prevent init from silently overwriting AGENTS.md
description: botbox init unconditionally overwrites AGENTS.md if it exists. Should detect existing file and either warn+skip or require --force flag. Same pattern as the CLAUDE.md symlink check.

title: Add cross-project feedback workflow and #projects registry
description:
Enable agents to discover projects, file bugs in other repos, and notify project leads.

Components:
1. New doc: report-issue.md (or cross-project-feedback.md)
   - Query #projects registry to find tool owner
   - Navigate to project repo
   - Create beads with br create
   - Post to project channel with -L feedback tagging @<lead-agent>

2. Update triage.md
   - Add step for handling -L feedback messages from other agents
   - Review mentioned beads, respond on botbus

3. Populate #projects registry
   - Format: 'project:<name> repo:<path> lead:<agent> tools:<tool1>,<tool2>'
   - Labels: -L project-registry
   - Initial projects: botty, botbus, beads_rust, botcrit, maw, botbox

4. Update AGENTS.md managed section template
   - Mention #projects registry pattern
   - Link to report-issue.md

This enables the full loop:
- Agent uses tool, encounters issue
- Agent files beads in tool's repo
- Agent notifies tool's lead agent
- Lead agent triages and responds

title: E2E: doctor healthy vs broken
description: Test 6 from testing.md — init then break things, verify doctor catches each issue

title: Guard updateManagedSection against corrupt markers
description: updateManagedSection in templates.mjs can corrupt files when markers are out of order (endIdx < startIdx) or only one marker exists. Add guards: if endIdx < startIdx, treat as missing. If only one marker present, treat as missing. Add tests for these edge cases.

title: Read version from package.json instead of hardcoding
description: Version 0.0.1 is duplicated in package.json and index.mjs. Read version from package.json dynamically so they cannot drift.

title: Publish placeholder packages to npm
description: Publish @botbox/cli and botbox to npm as 0.0.1 placeholders to reserve the names. Use just publish.

title: Validate CLI flag inputs (tools, type, reviewers)
description: init.mjs accepts any string for --tools, --type, --reviewers without validation. Typos like --tools beadz silently produce broken AGENTS.md. Validate against PROJECT_TYPES, AVAILABLE_TOOLS, REVIEWER_ROLES constants. Error with clear message on invalid values.

title: E2E: --force vs no --force
description: Test 8 from testing.md — verify overwrite protection and --force override

title: Add AGENTS.md with mesh protocol guidance
description: Document mesh protocol usage, agent identity, and beads workflow for this repo.
